title: Connection Issue: 'Attempting to Reconnect' issue - since URF patch. MAC - on iiNET
body: Basically since the URF patch I haven't been able to play a game of League of Legends without getting attempting to reconnect every 2 - 3 minutes. My ping stays at 35 the whole time while it's attempting to reconnect. I'm using a MacBook Air, and my ISP is iiNet. I've been playing for the last year without a problem. Has anyone else come across this/Know how to fix it? I really want to play URF.

replies.body: Have you tried [changing your DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5), or maybe just [flushing your DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq10) by itself?

I did. No result. 

Thanks for the reply

Have you made sure that all background processes, namely internet related ones like Safari and Skype, are closed while you play League?

Have you tried disabling your firewall/anti-virus while playing?
